ComicInfo.Summary: Anna Mercury is back in this summer's biggest explodo epic! Warren Ellis' fiery red-head once again bursts into mad science-fiction action with the stellar art of Facundo Percio, returning from the smash-hit original series! TECHNO-VIKINGS FROM BEYOND SPACE! Raiders who harrow the weird planet-cities of the extra-universal Constellation in their ancient mile-long warship, the Ultraspacial Dreadnought Vanaheim! Descending on the peaceful island of Three Souls Town, whose only possible savior might be... a girl from London with the call sign Anna Mercury. This series rockets into stores with a Regular cover by Paul Duffield, Wraparound by Juan Jose Ryp, and Painted by Felipe Massafera.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-08 09:47:30. [CVDB193380]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Digikore Studios, Felipe Massafera, Juan Jose Ryp, Michael DiPascale, Paul Duffield
